front.title: •Glancing Blow
front.gametext: If you have a character with a lightsaber present in a battle with Vader, lose 1 Force to reduce Vader's power to zero. OR If you have a character with a lightsaber in a duel, cancel one opponent's destiny draw immediately after it is revealed.
front.lore: It had been decades since Vader had felt the sting of an enemy's blade.
